p.bold: What’s new on the European Nephrology Portal!

body.p: With 8000 registered users European Nephrology Portal (ENP) has become a major hub for the Nephrology community around the world to access and engage with ERA-EDTA’s educational materials, content and activities.
ENP is all about Learning and Discovery.

With more than 4000 materials ranging from abstracts, speaker slides and webcasts from ERA-EDTA meetings, e-posters, NDTe-materials, sponsored education and NDTe-summary articles, ENP users can easily search and find the exciting content they are looking for.

As a delegate of an ERA-EDTA meeting you can use the Summary Builder Service to combine slides from different presentations to create a personalized summary PDF document or can send a message to the Congress Faculty.
Join the conversation about selected topics with KOLs and Experts at ERA-EDTA Dialogues.
ENP also provides you with personalized content recommendations.
If you want to know what’s new in Nephrology follow the NEWS updates on ENP or browse more than 200 news articles. A dedicated medical team publishes high-quality NEWS almost every day.

In 2018, ENP users will benefit from even more content and services: ERA-EDTA members can watch Live Streaming of the ERA-EDTA 2018 Congress, CME accredited e-learning courses will be launched and articles from the CKJ and NDT Journals will be part of the Hub and search engine.
Access is easy via a personal ENP account. ERA-EDTA members have full access to all content. Non-ERA-EDTA members can access a large number of materials.

p.bold: Renew your ERA-EDTA membership or become a member!

body.p: Being a member of ERA-EDTA means being part of one of the most important and prestigious European medical associations. The ERA-EDTA’s purpose is to encourage and report on advances in the field of clinical nephrology, dialysis, renal transplantation and related subjects. It is open to all qualified workers in the field of interest of the Association. To renew your membership, go to www.era-edta.org, click on ‘Membership’ and then on ‘Renew your Membership’.

If you are not a member, become one today! By becoming a member of the ERA-EDTA you will enjoy the many benefits that being part of the Association brings. Visit era-edta.org then click on ‘Membership’ and then on ‘Benefits’ to find out more.
Author fees continue to be waived for articles published in CKJ throughout 2018.
Visit the CKJ website https://academic.oup.com/ckj for more information.
